title: Blue Bloods (TV series)
summary: Blue Bloods is an American police procedural drama television series that has been airing on CBS since September 2010. Its main characters are members of the fictional Reagan family, an Irish-American Catholic family in New York City with a history of work in law enforcement. Blue Bloods stars Tom Selleck as New York City Police Commissioner Frank Reagan; other main cast members include Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes and Len Cariou for all eleven seasons, plus Amy Carlson (seasons 1–7) and Sami Gayle (season 1 – present, played by Marlene Lawston in the pilot episode).
